means: 合适的，适当的，适宜的，恰当的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均表示"适当的"或"适合的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: fit, proper, suitable, appropriate, apt, fitting
means: fit ： 指具有适合于某个目的，某种工作或某种用途等必需的品质或条件。
proper ： 往往侧重于符合某个标准或习惯。
suitable ： 指具有适合于某种特定场合、地位或情况等的品质。
appropriate ： 指专门适合于某人或某事，语气较重，强调"恰如其分"。
apt ： 专指性质或构造适合达到某一目的或得到某种结果的要求。
fitting ： 指与当时的目标、情绪状态、气氛、场合等相适应。

sentence.Network_en: The authority must make suitable accommodation available to the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 当局必须给这个家庭提供适当的食宿条件。

sentence.Network_en: The course is also suitable for those in the caring professions.
sentence.Network_cn: 本门课程同样适合护理业从业人士学习。

sentence.Network_en: They'd soon be penniless and homeless if she couldn't find suitable work.
sentence.Network_cn: 她要找不到合适的工作，他们很快就会身无分文，无家可归。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... register vt. 记录，登记 suitable a. 合适的；适当的 impatience n. 不耐烦；急躁.
字典中得字的解释 ... 必须,应该[ must] 合适;正确[ suitable;right] ◎ 得 de.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Response 回应 Suitable 适当的 Suit 合适.
九年级英语单词表 ... present perfect 现在完成时 suitable 适合的；适宜的 tiny 极小的；微小的.

list.abs: 锻钢闸阀_百度百科 ... 适用介质 Suitable Medium 适用温度（suitable temperature） Suitable Temperature 阀体 Body.
锻钢闸阀_百度百科 ... 填料 Stem Packing 适用介质（suitable medium） Suitable Medium 适用温度 Suitable Temperature.
Land covered with grass or vegetation suitable for grazing animals ., 牧场长着适于草食动物的草或植物土地.
Sinograma « 当 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 只当[ pretend; act just as] 至当[ most suitable] 不当紧[ not matter].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from the verb suit, on the pattern of agreeable

entry.def: Someone or something that is suitable for a particular purpose or occasion is right or acceptable for it.

example.ex: Employers usually decide within five minutes whether someone is suitable for the job...
example.tran: 雇主通常在 5 分钟内就能决定一个人是否适合这份工作。

example.ex: She had no other dress suitable for the occasion...
example.tran: 她没有其他适合这种场合穿的套裙。

sentences.sentence: "Is this a suitable dress for the office?"

means.word_mean: 2. meant or adapted for an occasion or use;

sentences.sentence: "a tractor suitable (or fit) for heavy duty"
"not an appropriate (or fit) time for flippancy"

means.word_mean: 3. appropriate for a condition or occasion;

sentences.sentence: "she is not suitable for the position"

means.word_mean: 4. worthy of being chosen especially as a spouse;

sentences.sentence: "the parents found the girl suitable for their son"

auth_sentence.content: Anwar's past makes him a suitable party man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Anwar's past makes him a suitable party man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Anwar's past makes him a suitable party man.

auth_sentence.content: Their subtext was how to secure a suitable husband.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their subtext was how to secure a suitable husband.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their subtext was how to secure a suitable husband.

auth_sentence.content: First, a suitable surrogate mother animal is required.
auth_sentence.res_content: First, a suitable surrogate mother animal is required.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First, a suitable surrogate mother animal is required.

stems_affixes.word_buile: suit[v.合适, 适合, 相配]+able……的→adj.适当的, 相配的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不适合的, 不相称的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+suitable[adj.适当的, 相配的]→adj.不适合的, 不相称的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 追赶, 追踪, 追击, 继续, 从事
stems_affixes.word_buile: pur+su跟随,追+e→v.追赶, 追踪, 追击, 继续, 从事

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合适, 适合, 相配
stems_affixes.word_buile: su跟随,追+it走→跟在后面走→相配

Sentence.sentence: I've been looking for a suitable place since I got here six months ago.

In order to begin tackling the challenge, the Institution recommends that: The UN Food and Agriculture Organisation work with the international engineering community to ensure governments of developed nations put in place programmes that transfer engineering knowledge, design know-how, and suitable technology to newly developing countries
It is recommended that engineering knowledge and suitable technology in developed countries be introduced to developing countries to improve produce handling in the harvest.

means.word_mean: 适当的, 适宜的, 恰当的

sentences.en: He hasn't any suitable shoes for the wedding.
sentences.cn: 婚礼上穿的鞋他一双也没有。

sentences.en: This wine is not suitable to my taste.

jushi.english: I would like to suggest to you that this is not a suitable time.
jushi.chinese: 我想向你提出,目前不是适当的时候。

jushi.english: When will she come to her senses and see that he is a totally suitable man to marry?
jushi.chinese: 她何时才能醒悟过来,明白他完全是她要嫁的合适的男人呢?

jushi.english: The trouble between them will be settled in a suitable manner in due course.
jushi.chinese: 他俩间的纠纷将在适当时机以适当方式解决。
